TipAddress: Put the addressin this fieldplease !
Tipcountry: Put the country name in this field !
TipClose: Use this buttonif you want to closethis window
TipExample: This is a sample of Help Tip Text
TipCompany: Put the company namein this field
CheckBoxSel: Check this box to enable the property beside...
TipUpdStyle: Click this button to update the current Tip Style Sheet file according to the current Lab settings
TipDeleteStyle: Click this button to delete the current Tip Style Sheet
TipCodeCopy: Click this button to get a copy of the upside code in your Pasteboard
TipHelpDisplay: The check Box below can enable/disable the properties
UnCheckBoxSel: Uncheck this box to disable the property beside...
